    • Method Detail

      • addAchievementTier

        public SirqulResponse addAchievementTier(Long accountId,
                                Long achievementId,
                                String iconFilePath,
                                String title,
                                String description,
                                Long goalCount)
                                  throws SirqulException
        Adds a tier to an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement is created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/tier/add
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        achievementId - the achievement id for adding a new tier
        iconFilePath - the achievement tier icon image file path
        title - the title of the achievement tier
        description - the description of the achievement tier
        goalCount - the count requirement for completing the achievement tier
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addOrUpdateAchievement

        public AchievementShortResponse addOrUpdateAchievement(Long accountId,
                                              String appKey,
                                              Long achievementId,
                                              String analyticsTag,
                                              String title,
                                              String description,
                                              Enums.RankType rankType,
                                              Integer rankIncrement,
                                              Boolean validate)
                                                throws SirqulException
        Create or update an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement is created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        appKey - the application key the achievement is for
        achievementId - the achievement ID for updating an existing achievement, leave empty for creating a new achievement
        analyticsTag - the analytics tag that will trigger when a user's achievement count gets updated
        title - the title of the achievement (255 character limit)
        description - the description of the achievement
        rankType - the rank type for updating leader boards
        rankIncrement - determines how much the rank count is incremented
        validate - determines whether to the customId on analytics are
        Returns:
        a AchievementShortResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getAchievement

        public AchievementResponse getAchievement(Long accountId,
                                 Long achievementId)
                                   throws SirqulException
        Get detailed information about an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement was created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        achievementId - the achievement ID
        Returns:
        a AchievementResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getAchievements

        public ListResponse<AchievementProgressResponse> getAchievements(Long accountId,
                                                        String connectionAccountEmail,
                                                        Long connectionAccountId,
                                                        String appKey,
                                                        Boolean includeUndiscovered,
                                                        Location location)
                                                          throws SirqulException
        Gets a list of of user achievements.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/achievement/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user
        connectionAccountEmail - the email of the account to view achievements
        connectionAccountId - the id of the account to view achievements
        appKey - the application key for filtering results by application
        includeUndiscovered - determines whether to return achievements that the user has not discovered yet
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        ListResponse<AchievementProgressResponse> on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeAchievement

        public SirqulResponse removeAchievement(Long accountId,
                               Long achievementId)
                                 throws SirqulException
        Deletes an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement was created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user
        achievementId - the achievement id for deletion
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeAchievementTier

        public SirqulResponse removeAchievementTier(Long accountId,
                                   Long achievementTierId)
                                     throws SirqulException
        Deletes an achievement tier (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement was created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/tier/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user
        achievementTierId - the achievement tier id for deletion
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchAchievements

        public SearchResponse<AchievementShortResponse> searchAchievements(Long accountId,
                                                          String appKey,
                                                          Enums.AchievementApiMap sortField,
                                                          Boolean descending,
                                                          Integer start,
                                                          Integer limit,
                                                          Boolean activeOnly)
                                                            throws SirqulException
        Searches achievements by application.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        appKey - the application key
        sortField - the field to sort by. See Enums.AchievementApiMap
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - the start index for pagination
        limit - the limit for pagination
        activeOnly - Filter results to only return active employees
        Returns:
        a SearchResponse<AchievementShortResponse> on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateAchievementTier

        public SirqulResponse updateAchievementTier(Long accountId,
                                   Long achievementTierId,
                                   String iconFilePath,
                                   String title,
                                   String description,
                                   Long goalCount)
                                     throws SirqulException
        Updates a tier of an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement is created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/tier/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        achievementTierId - the achievement tier id for updating
        iconFilePath - achievement tier icon image file path
        title - the title of the achievement tier
        description - the description of the achievement tier
        goalCount - the count requirement for completing the achievement tier
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
